name: mikroe.click.speedsense
short_description: Speed Sense Click is a compact add-on board that allows you to measure the speed and rotation of a spinning object. This board features the A17501, a dual output differential speed and direction sensor from Allegro Microsystems. It has a high-speed switching bandwidth of up to 40kHz for two different signals. The sensor has two independent output channels with options for high-resolution XOR speed, pulse, and direction protocol.
